description: Expression referring to things that have passed through many years and have history.

examples.chinese: 年代久远又罕见的破二手车
examples.translation: An ancient and rare second-hand car

examples.chinese: 年代久远一条老街,回忆杀
examples.translation: An age-old street, a nostalgia trip

examples.chinese: 这是一条年代久远的牛仔裤
examples.translation: This is a vintage pair of jeans
